description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，前中国国民党籍。曾任南投县议员、南投市市长、南投县县长。任职县长期间，因涉及多起灾修工程回扣等贪污弊案，遭判刑定谳入狱，并被中国国民党开除党籍。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and a former member of the Kuomintang. He served as a member of the Nantou County Council, Mayor of Nantou City, and Magistrate of Nantou County. During his tenure as county magistrate, he was convicted and imprisoned for his involvement in multiple corruption cases, including taking kickbacks from disaster recovery projects, and was subsequently expelled from the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省南投县的最高行政首长。
description.en: The chief executive of Nantou County, Taiwan Province, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省南投县南投市的最高行政首长。
description.en: The chief executive of Nantou City, Nantou County, Taiwan Province, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国南投县的最高立法机关。
description.en: The highest legislative body of Nantou County, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创始政党与主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the founding and major political parties of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省南投县下辖的镇。
description.en: A township under the jurisdiction of Nantou County, Taiwan Province, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾高雄市的私立科技大学。
description.en: A private university of science and technology located in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

en: Central Taiwan University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台中市的私立科技大学。
description.en: A private university of science and technology located in Taichung, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台中市的私立综合大学。
description.en: A private comprehensive university located in Taichung, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院长、中国国民党秘书长等职。曾与李朝卿等人同游峇里岛而引发争议。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who has served as Premier and Secretary-General of the Kuomintang. He was involved in a controversy for traveling to Bali with Li Chao-ching and others.

description.zh-cn: 吴敦义的妻子，曾与丈夫和李朝卿等人同游峇里岛。
description.en: Wife of Wu Den-yih, she traveled to Bali with her husband, Li Chao-ching, and others.

description.zh-cn: 台湾中部角头大哥，曾获陈水扁总统特赦假释。他曾与吴敦义、李朝卿同游峇里岛，并为李朝卿助选。
description.en: A gang leader from central Taiwan, who was granted parole by President Chen Shui-bian. He traveled to Bali with Wu Den-yih and Li Chao-ching, and assisted in Li's election campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。他在2002年特赦假释了中部角头大哥江钦良。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President. In 2002, he granted a special parole to gang leader Chiang Chin-liang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国法务部下属的检察机关，负责侦办李朝卿贪污案。
description.en: A prosecutorial agency under the Ministry of Justice of the Republic of China, responsible for investigating the corruption case of Li Chao-ching.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国司法院下属的地方法院，对李朝卿贪污案进行了一审判决。
description.en: A district court under the Judicial Yuan of the Republic of China, which conducted the first-instance trial of Li Chao-ching's corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 李朝卿的妻舅，在李朝卿贪污案中被法院认定担任“白手套”并被判刑。
description.en: Li Chao-ching's brother-in-law, who was convicted for acting as a middleman in Li's corruption case.

en: Ministry of the Interior, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国中央行政机关，在李朝卿贪污案中负责其停职与复职相关事宜。
description.en: A central government agency of the Republic of China, responsible for matters related to the suspension and reinstatement of Li Chao-ching during his corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，时任内政部长，处理了李朝卿的停职及移送监察院案。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who, as the Minister of the Interior at the time, handled Li Chao-ching's suspension and referral to the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾公开反对李朝卿在交保后复职。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who publicly opposed Li Chao-ching's reinstatement after he was released on bail.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高监察机关，于2013年9月通过对李朝卿的弹劾案。
description.en: The highest control body of the Republic of China, which passed the impeachment of Li Chao-ching in September 2013.

nodes.id: 台湾高等法院台中分院

zh-cn: 台湾高等法院台中分院

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾高等法院的分院之一，对李朝卿贪污案进行了二审判决。
description.en: A branch of the Taiwan High Court of the Republic of China, which conducted the second-instance trial of Li Chao-ching's corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国司法院下属的终审法院，对李朝卿贪污案的部分罪名作出终审判决。
description.en: The court of last resort under the Judicial Yuan of the Republic of China, which made the final judgment on some of the charges in Li Chao-ching's corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，李朝卿的前一任南投县县长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, Li Chao-ching's predecessor as Magistrate of Nantou County.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，在李朝卿因贪污案停职期间代理南投县县长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as the acting Magistrate of Nantou County while Li Chao-ching was suspended due to his corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 李朝卿担任南投县第15、16届县长，后因涉贪污案被停职。
description.en: Li Chao-ching served as the 15th and 16th Magistrate of Nantou County and was later suspended due to a corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 李朝卿担任南投市第6、7届市长。
description.en: Li Chao-ching served as the 6th and 7th Mayor of Nantou City.

description.zh-cn: 李朝卿曾任南投县议会第13届议员。
description.en: Li Chao-ching served as a member of the 13th Nantou County Council.

description.zh-cn: 李朝卿原为中国国民党籍，后于2017年9月6日因贪污案被开除党籍。
description.en: Li Chao-ching was originally a member of the Kuomintang but was expelled on September 6, 2017, due to his corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 因李朝卿贪污案二审被判刑，中国国民党中央常务委员会决议撤销其党籍。
description.en: Due to Li Chao-ching's conviction in the second instance of his corruption case, the Kuomintang's Central Standing Committee resolved to revoke his party membership.

degree.en: Graduate Institute of Cultural and Educational Business Management
Master's degree from the Graduate Institute of Industrial Engineering

description.zh-cn: 2008年，李朝卿夫妇与时任国民党秘书长吴敦义夫妇、中部角头大哥江钦良等人一同前往印尼峇里岛旅游，引发争议。
description.en: In 2008, Li Chao-ching and his wife traveled to Bali, Indonesia, with then-KMT Secretary-General Wu Den-yih and his wife, and gang leader Chiang Chin-liang, which sparked controversy.

description.zh-cn: 江钦良曾为李朝卿成立后援会助选。
description.en: Chiang Chin-liang once established a support group to assist in Li Chao-ching's election campaign.

description.zh-cn: 2002年，时任总统陈水扁特赦假释江钦良出狱。
description.en: In 2002, then-President Chen Shui-bian granted a special parole for the release of Chiang Chin-liang from prison.

description.zh-cn: 针对李朝卿涉嫌收取灾修工程回扣，依贪污罪嫌提起公诉。
description.en: Indicted Li Chao-ching on charges of corruption for allegedly taking kickbacks from disaster recovery projects.

description.zh-cn: 一审判决李朝卿30年有期徒刑，褫夺公权10年。
description.en: In the first-instance trial, Li Chao-ching was sentenced to 30 years in prison and deprived of civil rights for 10 years.

relationships.source: 台湾高等法院台中分院

description.zh-cn: 二审改判处李朝卿22年有期徒刑，褫夺公权10年。
description.en: In the second-instance trial, the sentence was amended to 22 years in prison and deprivation of civil rights for 10 years.

description.zh-cn: 就李朝卿贪污案其中8项罪名驳回上诉，合计判刑98年确定，其余罪名发回更审。
description.en: Rejected the appeal for 8 of the corruption charges against Li Chao-ching, finalizing a total sentence of 98 years, and remanded the other charges for retrial.

description.zh-cn: 时任内政部长李鸿源宣布将李朝卿移送监察院调查，并依法继续予以停职。
description.en: Then-Minister of the Interior Lee Hong-yuan announced the referral of Li Chao-ching to the Control Yuan for investigation and his continued suspension from office in accordance with the law.

description.zh-cn: 声明若李朝卿在交保后复职回任县长，将号召人民到南投县政府前抗议。
description.en: Stated that if Li Chao-ching were reinstated as county magistrate after being released on bail, he would call on people to protest in front of the Nantou County Government.

description.zh-cn: 以11票对1票通过对李朝卿的弹劾案。
description.en: Passed the impeachment of Li Chao-ching with a vote of 11 to 1.

description.zh-cn: 简瑞祺是李朝卿的妻舅。
description.en: Chien Jui-chi is Li Chao-ching's brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 李朝卿接替林宗男担任南投县县长。
description.en: Li Chao-ching succeeded Lin Tsung-nan as Magistrate of Nantou County.

description.zh-cn: 因李朝卿涉贪停职，时任副县长的陈志清代理其南投县县长职务。
description.en: Due to Li Chao-ching's suspension for corruption, then-Deputy Magistrate Chen Chih-ching served as the acting Magistrate of Nantou County.
